2457 
2460  void SetRecordingsLifetimeValues(const std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>>& recordingsLifetimeValues)
2461  {
2462  m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize = 0;
2463  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize && i < sizeof(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues); ++i)
2464  {
2465  m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].iValue = recordingsLifetimeValues[i].first;
2466  strncpy(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription, recordingsLifetimeValues[i].second.c_str(),
2467  sizeof(m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription) - 1);
2468  ++m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize;
2469  }
2470  }
2471 
2473  std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>> GetRecordingsLifetimeValues() const
2474  {
2475  std::vector<std::pair<int, std::string>> recordingsLifetimeValues;
2476  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_capabilities->iRecordingsLifetimesSize; ++i)
2477  {
2478  int value = m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].iValue;
2479  std::string str = m_capabilities->recordingsLifetimeValues[i].strDescription;
2480  recordingsLifetimeValues.push_back(std::pair<int, std::string>(value, str));
2481  }
2482  return recordingsLifetimeValues;
2483  }
2485 
2486 private:
2487  PVR_ADDON_CAPABILITIES* m_capabilities;
2488 };

7210 private:
7211  void SetAddonStruct(KODI_HANDLE instance, const std::string& kodiVersion)
7212  {
7213  if (instance == nullptr)
7214  throw std::logic_error("kodi::addon::CInstancePVRClient: Creation with empty addon structure not allowed, table must be given from Kodi!");
7215 
7216  m_instanceData = static_cast<AddonInstance_PVR*>(instance);
7217  m_instanceData->toAddon->addonInstance = this;
7218  //--==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==----==
7219  m_instanceData->toAddon->GetCapabilities = ADDON_GetCapabilities;

7364  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetChannels(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7365  ADDON_HANDLE handle,
7366  bool radio)
7367  {
7368  std::vector<PVRChannel> channels;
7369  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetChannels(radio, channels);
7370  for (auto iter : channels)
7371  {
7372  instance->toKodi->TransferChannelEntry(instance->toKodi->kodiInstance, handle, iter);
7373  }
7374  return error;
7375  }
7376 
7377  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetChannelStreamProperties(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7378  const PVR_CHANNEL* channel,
7379  PVR_NAMED_VALUE* properties,
7380  unsigned int* propertiesCount)
7381  {
7382  std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> propertiesList;
7383  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetChannelStreamProperties(channel, propertiesList);
7384  *propertiesCount = 0;
7385  for (auto iter : propertiesList)
7386  {
7387  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strName, iter.first.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strName) - 1);
7388  strncpy(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue, iter.second.c_str(), sizeof(properties[*propertiesCount].strValue) - 1);
7389  ++*propertiesCount;
7390  if (*propertiesCount > STREAM_MAX_PROPERTY_COUNT)
7391  break;
7392  }
7393  return error;
7394  }

7684  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetTimerTypes(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7685  PVR_TIMER_TYPE* types,
7686  int* typesCount)
7687  {
7688  std::vector<PVRTimerType> timerTypes;
7689  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetTimerTypes(timerTypes);
7690  *typesCount = 0;
7691  for (auto iter : timerTypes)
7692  {
7693  types[*typesCount] = *iter;
7694  ++*typesCount;
7695  if (*typesCount >= PVR_ADDON_TIMERTYPE_ARRAY_SIZE)
7696  break;
7697  }
7698  return error;
7699  }

7706  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetTimers(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7707  ADDON_HANDLE handle)
7708  {
7709  std::vector<PVRTimer> timers;
7710  PVR_ERROR error = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetTimers(timers);
7711  for (auto iter : timers)
7712  instance->toKodi->TransferTimerEntry(instance->toKodi->kodiInstance, handle, iter);
7713  return error;
7714  }

7796 
7797  inline static PVR_ERROR ADDON_GetStreamProperties(const AddonInstance_PVR* instance,
7798  PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES* properties)
7799  {
7800  std::vector<PVRStreamProperties> cppProperties;
7801  PVR_ERROR err = static_cast<CInstancePVRClient*>(instance->toAddon->addonInstance)->GetStreamProperties(cppProperties);
7802  if (err == PVR_ERROR_NO_ERROR)
7803  {
7804  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cppProperties.size(); ++i)
7805  {
7806  memcpy(&properties->stream[i], static_cast<PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES::PVR_STREAM*>(cppProperties[i]), sizeof(PVR_STREAM_PROPERTIES::PVR_STREAM));
7807  ++properties->iStreamCount;
7808 
7809  if (properties->iStreamCount >= PVR_STREAM_MAX_STREAMS)
7810  {
7811  kodi::Log(ADDON_LOG_ERROR, "CInstancePVRClient::%s: Addon given with '%li' more allowed streams where '%i'",
7812  __func__, cppProperties.size(), PVR_STREAM_MAX_STREAMS);
7813  break;
7814  }
7815  }
7816  }
7817 
7818  return err;
7819  }
